legacies.label: Apostle Contemnant
legacies.description: Germany, 1944 - the hounds of war come at last for the blood of the black eagle. A great hinge of the Corrivality will turn.
legacies.startdescription: A month has passed since we started west; since we escaped Sobibor. Someone there had started a fire, gave us an opening - someone whom I know, and hate. Will that someone find me again? They had promised...
quotes: "War is the language of hatred. We who wield it will be avenged a hundredfold upon those who have wronged us." St. Kazimir of Gorokhovets, Recollections from a Childhood
